import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk Delete Asset Types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/types/bulk/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple asset types in a single request. You can target explicit identifiers or delete all matching types by combining `IsSelectAll` with filter criteria in `AssetTypesRequest`.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetTypeIds** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types) to identify the asset types to delete when `IsSelectAll` is false.
2. **AssetTypesRequest** (optional) - Build filter criteria when `IsSelectAll` is true to select all matching asset types.

**Workflow Example**
1. List asset types and decide which should be removed.
2. Build a `BulkAssetTypeDeleteRequest` with either `AssetTypeIds` or `IsSelectAll` + `AssetTypesRequest`.
3. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/types/bulk/delete](/docs/api/assets/bulk-delete-asset-types) to remove the selected types.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Request` plus either `AssetTypeIds` or `IsSelectAll` with `AssetTypesRequest`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Bulk request wrapper for deleting multiple asset types. Mirrors `BulkAssetTypeRequest<BulkDeleteAssetTypeRequest>`.","properties":{"AssetTypeIds":{"type":"array","description":"List of asset type identifiers to delete when `IsSelectAll` is false.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"description":"The delete command to apply to the selected asset types.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Individual delete command for an asset type in a bulk operation. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.BulkDeleteAssetTypeRequest`.","properties":{"AssetTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The unique identifier of the asset type to delete."}},"required":["AssetTypeId"],"title":"BulkDeleteAssetTypeRequest"}]},"IsSelectAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, ignores `AssetTypeIds` and applies the operation to all asset types matching the `AssetTypesRequest` criteria.","default":false},"AssetTypesRequest":{"description":"Filtering criteria applied when `IsSelectAll` is true.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Filtering and pagination options for retrieving asset types. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.GetAssetTypesRequest`.","properties":{"FilterByProduct":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, filters the result set to include only types applicable to the active product module.","default":true},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional product identifier to filter by."},"ResourceGroupIds":{"type":"array","description":"Optional list of resource group identifiers to filter by.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}},"title":"GetAssetTypesRequest"}]}},"required":["Request"],"example":{"AssetTypeIds":["11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","22222222-2222-4222-8222-222222222222"],"Request":{"AssetTypeId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"IsSelectAll":false},"title":"BulkAssetTypeDeleteRequest"},"example":{"AssetTypeIds":["11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","22222222-2222-4222-8222-222222222222"],"Request":{"AssetTypeId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"IsSelectAll":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
